game.name: ARMORED HEAD
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ARMORED HEAD is a miniature shooter, where all the action takes place in one arena. The main character is a gladiator who fights against his opponents in pursuit of the grand prize.

reviewHighlights.text: Great arena shooter, lots of fun especially given how cheap it is. There's good variety in the weapons and their applications with each weapon having...
Fun shooter game with addictive mechanics to spend time for a few hours( or more). For the price, it is a very smart indie gem. Kudos to the dev.
